sen.j: 土御門 泰誠（つちみかど やすまさ、延宝5年2月20日 (旧暦)（1677年3月23日）－元禄4年12月17日（1692年2月3日））は、江戸時代前期の公家。
sen.e: Yasumasa TSUCHIMIKADO (March 23, 1677 to February 3, 1692) was a kuge (court noble) in the early Edo period.
Yasumasa TSUCHIMIKADO (March 23, 1677 to February 3, 1692) was a kuge (court noble) in the early Edo period.
Yasumasa TSUCHIMIKADO (March 23, 1677 to February 3, 1692) was a kuge (court noble) in the early Edo period.
He was the legitimate son of Yasutomi TSUCHIMIKADD.
He was the legitimate son of Yasutomi TSUCHIMIKADD.
He was the legitimate son of Yasutomi TSUCHIMIKADD.

sen.j: 土御門家_(安倍氏)36代目当主とされている。
sen.e: He was made to the 36th generation household master of the TSUCHIMIKADO family (the Abe clan).
He was made to the 36th generation household master of the TSUCHIMIKADO family (the Abe clan).
He was made to the 36th generation household master of the TSUCHIMIKADO family (the Abe clan).

sen.j: 15歳で元服して従五位上弾正少弼となる。
sen.e: He attended the ceremony to celebrate his coming of age when he was 15 and became Junior Fifth Rank Upper Grade Danjo-Shohitsu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He celebrated his coming of age when he was 15 and became Junior Fifth Rank Upper Grade Danjo-Shohitsu.
sen.cmt: 「元服」＝celebrated his coming of ageとしました。
sen.e: He celebrated his coming of age when he was 15 and became Junior Fifth Rank Upper Grade Danjo-Shohitsu.

sen.j: しかし、程なく病死する。
sen.e: However, he died soon of sickness.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: However, he died of sickness soon.
However, he died of sickness soon.

sen.j: このため、弟の土御門泰連が養子として家督を継承した。
sen.e: Therefore, his younger brother Yasutsura TSUCHIMIKADO succeeded to the family estate as an adopted son.
Therefore, his younger brother Yasutsura TSUCHIMIKADO succeeded to the family estate as an adopted son.
Therefore, his younger brother Yasutsura TSUCHIMIKADO succeeded to the family estate as an adopted son.
